description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE BASIC CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

How to write SQL queries to access data stored in an Oracle Database schema. Learn to manipulate data and use various types of functions for customizing data output.

You will learn essential SQL skills that allow developers to write queries against single and multiple tables, manipulate data in tables, and create database objects.

Learn to use single row functions to customize output, use conversion functions and conditional expressions
title: Oracle SQL 11g - Fundamentals
